caption.p: Telomere length at baseline and 18 months (A) and telomere shortening (given as change per months) over 18 months (B) in controls and Parkinson’s disease patients. Each category box plot includes the median ( —), the range of data within the first and third quartiles (box), the range of data within the first and ninth deciles (whiskers) and the outliers falling outside of the latter (°). aStatistically significant using the Mann-Whitney U Test.
